page.title: 16Mr.Tony Bleach of Lavant
page.content: Mr.Bleach, whose family owned a transport company, has lived in Lavant all his life, which is fifty years. The lorries have been used for transporting goods since 1920. His brother owns 18 lorries at the moment. His family have lived in Lavant for about 100 years. The land that Bleach's Garage was built on was bought in 1930. When Mr.Bleach was a teenager he used to belong to a sing along band called The Bevery Boys. His interests are Country and Western Concerts. He likes Lavant because it is near the sea and Chichester and is fairly close to London. He hopes that in the future Chichester will not swallow up Lavant by the increase of building between Lavant and Chichester.
